title: Kingsoft Office Suite Professional 2013 9.1.0.4256 preactivated
description:
[b]Kingsoft Office Suite Professional 2013 9.1.0.4256 Pre-activated[/b]


[img]http://s28.postimg.org/4cn5j3ijh/Kingsoft_Office_2013_box_1.jpg[/img]


[b]Kingsoft Office Suite Professional 2013 9.1.0.4256 [/b]

As an office suite of desktop applications, Kingsoft Office consists of a word processorÃ¢â‚¬â€Writer, a spreadsheet programÃ¢â‚¬â€Spreadsheets and a presentation programÃ¢â‚¬â€Presentation. Compared with other office suites, Kingsoft Office is regarded as one of the best office applications with user-friendly interfaces and excellent performance.

In addition to innovative features in the last version such as a built-in PDF creator, the latest version has added various new features, allowing you to switch between the 2013 and classical interfaces, adjust your paragraph formatting and table dimensions with drag and drop, save files as more formats (such as .docx, .docm, .xlsx and .xlsm) and insert a movie or background sound into a PPT slide. Kingsoft Office Suite Professional 2013 will not only enable you to fulfill data analyzing needs in business, but to turn your innovative ideas into illustrative documents or presentations.


WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new in Professional Office Suite 2013

[b]Writer[/b]

[+] Add Restrict Editing and Restrict Formatting options under Review tab (2013 style interface) and Tools menu (Classic interface)
[+] Support exporting PDF with background color
[+] Support find and replace formatting

[b]Spreadsheets[/b]

[+] Support AutoFilter by color
[+] Add GetPivotData function
[+] Add function recommendation list when inputting functions in cell
[+] Support applying custom color for reading layout view

[b]What are the key features of Office 2013?[/b]

1. Highly compatible with MS Office (97/2000/2003/2007/2010/2013)
2. Advanced paragraph adjustment tool
3. Humanized table operation
4. Multiple tabs on the interface
5. Create multiple hyperlinks at one time in Spreadsheets
6. Automatic spell check
7. Set encryption for your documents
8. Convert office documents to PDF format
9. Directly send files as an email attachment
10. Tons of FREE PPT templates

[b]Help & Support:[/b]
You can contact us by email if you need help. Additionally, we offer frequently asked questions, tutorials a knowledge base and the user manual online.



[b]System Requirements for Office Suite Professional 2013[/b]

[b]Required Operating System:[/b]

Windows XP / Windows Vista (32bit, 64bit) / Windows 7 (32bit, 64bit) / Windows 8

[b]Basic Configurations:[/b]

CPU: Pentium II 266 MHz or higher
Memory: at least 128 MB
Hardware: at least 200 MB available space

[b]Recommended Configurations:[/b]

CPU: Pentium III 450 MHz or higherÃ£â‚¬â‚¬Ã£â‚¬â‚¬Memory: 256 MB or larger
Hardware: 250 MB available
